title: Ep. 996 - Leftist Elites Laugh Because The Joke's On Us
description:
Biden belly-laughs at your pain during the White House Correspondents Association dinner, America’s most famous leftist intellectual praises Donald Trump, and the Italian government turns feminist.

Join the Daily Wire and get 20% off your membership with code KNOWLES: https://utm.io/uewve.

I’m exposing the most successful failure in government history. Stream Fauci Unmasked here: https://utm.io/ueogL.

Pre-order your copy of Julio Rosas’ upcoming book Fiery but Mostly Peaceful: The 2020 Riots and the Gaslighting of America: https://utm.io/uepi9.
